html:
5.26.20  8:34 pm   when is the sequel to ball & stick

      soon it is going to rain sequels

5.26.20  8:04 pm   Why did you design your website this way?

      i'm just trying to be reasonable

5.26.20  8:02 pm   i know youve said you dont want to do an album because it would be too long to make a video/visual for,

     i never said that

      but what about an EP? that can be just like three songs, which isnt too hard to make a video for if you wanted to right?

     i would love to make 3 songs (actually much more), with a video each, packaged and released separately

     i'm not trying to make you do it, but i do want to know if you've ever thought about it before

     i have thought about packaging songs together, because the idea seems so warm and delicious. but when i recall all the times that anyone else does it, i've never liked it and it has never actually provided me with that warm feeling i'm looking for. so i've begun to think i am thinking of something more. more than just a packaging of songs

5.26.20  7:33 pm   Is my hat bent?

      not gonna lie it might be

5.26.20  7:28 pm   Do rhino beetles descend from rhinos?

      no but they probably both descended from the same thing

5.26.20  7:20 pm   What are chairs

      it's like a table for your ass. ass table

5.26.20  7:20 pm   im afraid of trying to make music in a production setting. ive fucked so much ive given up, but i may be lying to myself when i say "i just wont be able to ever make music like i want". even if i try to make music, i owe so much music

      try the opposite of a 'production' setting. see if that brings anything to life. try using 1 instrument and singing songs, in real time. see what happens

5.26.20  7:09 pm   How to be random while being intelligent and not stupid?

      you could use randomness (computer generated), and then do something unrandom (intelligent) with it

5.26.20  7:01 pm   Why are you the pinnacle of comedy

      maybe it is due to the strict moral ban on comedy that i have upheld since day 1

5.26.20  6:44 pm   do you like your music

      it's up to me to make it how i like it..... if that's even possible

5.26.20  6:27 pm   When i create my own artwork, would it be an artwork you would have created also were you to live long enough to finish everything you ever wanted to and would want to finish?

      not exactly

5.26.20  5:54 pm   hey bill! sometimes i ask you a question and forget about and come back and cannot find it. 

      was it this one

5.26.20  5:46 pm   is "crisp inseam" still an accurate anagram for the title of the upcoming video?

      that would be for a song title, but it will most likely be a later video, not the next one

5.26.20  5:22 pm   what is your knowledge on cars

      the positioning of the steering wheel within the car is a good clue as to which side of the road you are not supposed to drive on

5.26.20  5:19 pm   What do you think about accordions ?

      very flexible. not just in their physical shape, but also in the dates and times you can arrange to rent one

5.26.20  5:12 pm   what is the correct order in the fruit hierarchy

      it's all melons

5.26.20  5:05 pm   What do you hold as truest

      the shape of the ground, and the patterns it makes

5.26.20  5:01 pm   What is a common thing that goes through your mind everyday?

      raging self doubt

5.26.20  4:27 pm   What are some good resources for finding inspiration in song writing?

      anything that's ever existed before, and also, your imagination

5.26.20  4:26 pm   You seemingly answer these questions all through a continuous 24-hour time span.

     that is probably because you are assuming that those date/times are the time i answered it. but it's not. that's actually when it was asked

      Do you sleep at all? 

     yes, i may have even been asleep when you asked this

5.26.20  4:06 pm   How to use Google?

      let Google use you

5.26.20  4:00 pm   Best hangover cure?

      water

5.26.20  3:07 pm   what's the chord progression of "and the day goes on"?

      something like this

5.26.20  3:07 pm   when you've faced struggles, how did you cope with them?

     usually the best way is to talk about it and discuss the situation in great detail

     could you give an example?

      there are surely many examples in the 'reality' section of this site

5.26.20  3:04 pm   do you think 0 and infinity are the same?

      they seem to have some similarities

5.26.20  3:00 pm   When did you decide to start making music

      i don't know. as far back as i can remember, i had already started

5.26.20  2:51 pm   What games do you like playing in your free time?

      my time is actually very expensive

5.26.20  2:36 pm   Do you still use OS X Mavericks?

      never did

5.26.20  2:29 pm   what are you learning right now?

      i am not so much learning as inventing. which i suppose is similar in some ways

5.26.20  2:27 pm   Hey mr Wurtz, I love ur music, and my question is very important. What do think of triangular bread?

      that's going to make it more difficult to evade the crust, if that's your game plan

5.26.20  1:56 pm   Is it a good idea to consider myself smart?

      maybe, but don't let that take away from the time you could be spending actually being smart

5.26.20  1:55 pm   Do you think that the current society has screwed up somewhere?

     sure

      If so, where?

     everywhere, but these screw-ups are intricately laced and intertwined with non-screwups

5.26.20  1:52 pm   do you like to fly? you know, like in planes?

     yes

     i'm very excited for my next flight

     me too, but i don't have a good understanding of when that can be

5.26.20  1:13 pm   How would you define the attributes and qualities of Bill Wurtz? Is he man? myth? mythic man?

      my best strategy is to demonstrate

5.26.20  1:09 pm   if you had to name a newly discovered US state what would you name it and why?

      the trick to naming states is figure out what name it already had. unless literally no one was there before, but that's probably never the case. which also probably means you didn't discover it, you invaded it

5.26.20  12:47 pm   what is earth?

      some kind of sports ball

5.26.20  12:46 pm   What inspires you to create perfect music

      nothing, ever since i figured out that the only perfect music is total silence. which kind of goes against the whole point of music

5.26.20  11:34 am   What is your definition of paradise?

      it's pretty good

5.26.20  11:16 am   How did you get the next stop thing for "fell in love on the Q train", it looks as if you somehow screenshot the sign.

      i had a photo for reference, but i assembled it graphically from scratch. with the help of the right fonts

5.26.20  10:50 am   what was your inspiration for la de da de da de da de day oh

      the chorus was inspired by the pre-chorus. the pre-chorus was inspired by wanting to write a song. and the verse was inspired by feeling like i would never have enough time to express and do all the things i want to

5.26.20  10:13 am   are you working on anything right now

      yes

5.26.20  10:10 am   Why are so many of your old videos under 10 seconds?

      there are 2 reasons. for the ones from around 2014, the reason is because making videos is sort of an infinitely elaborate process, and i've found that keeping the content insanely short is a brilliant way to gradually develop your skills. If we're talking about the videos from a littler later, around 2015, the reason is because those are actually just youtube versions of videos that were written for a site called Vine, which was like a square version of tiktok with a time limit of 6 and a half seconds

5.26.20  10:10 am   why do the kamikaze pilots wear helmets?

      to fit in with the rest of the pilots

5.26.20  10:08 am   If life is a game who is the main character and who is the villain?

      you are both

5.26.20  9:47 am   Aren't vampires just human mosquitoes?

      not quite

5.26.20  9:13 am   is it possible for a person to destroy the earth?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

5.26.20  8:20 am   good luck on creating your thing to make other things! opinion on exceptions?

      they are special

5.26.20  8:12 am   Why is water wet?

      to Anger the scientists

5.26.20  7:18 am   is life real

      how did you know

5.26.20  7:08 am   coolest animal on the planet that isnt extinct?

      could be you
